item.description:
PLEASE DO NOT DOUBLE TRIPLE OR QUADRUPLE RSVP

Hi folks, Biagio (Social Fun) invited our group to his event. It should be a good chance to meet people from across several meetup groups. I'm not sure if I can go, but Sid from Nightlife has generously volunteered to be the point person for this event.

posting, taken from Social Fun's site:
"Kitty OShea's is an awesome spot to host another Mix and Mingle cross Meetup party for 160 members on Friday Oct 23, 2009. This is not a Singles Party. Meaning anyone can come which including couples. All are welcome to Party and Socialize.

Location: Kitty OShea's is in Boston (near Faneuil Hall) 131 State St Boston, MA 02109 617-725-0100 Website http://www.kittyoshea....

The 2nd floor can hold 160 people. There are 2 Bars upstairs, 4 huge comfy couches, AC, its own DJ area with light machine and dance floor, plus its own bathrooms upstairs so we would truly have our own private party.

Note: Music will be medium levels in main room upstairs. Music will be tuned very low in the back room so members can have a separate area to chat!
Till about 9PM then the Dancing and music starts, then its gets loud . Please do not complain since people came to dance and hear the music too
There will be 3 Bartender upstairs: 2 at the upfront Bar and 1 in the back .
I have ordered and paid for over $200 worth of appetizers (Wings/veggie platter, cheeses etc) because their Kitchen is too small and we will never get enough food for 160 members. The bar will refill any appetizers platter just once.

The $5 I collect covers the cost to rent us the whole 2nd floor, 3 bartenders +the DJ so its not all just to cover the food. Please find Biagio at the party and please give Biagio the $5. Please no one dollar bills .

After you get inside there is a Security at the stairs please tell them you are with Social Fun to get in (Even if you are with a different group) . If you say ANY other group they will not let you in. I had a few issues with this last time and Security did not let some people in, because they could not remember to say they were with Social Fun.

Please have $5 ready in hand at the top of the stairs if you take too long Security will make members to go back downstairs. Sorry we cannot block the stairs
Please introduce yourself to me, let me know what group you are in, and be Social.

1. Let me make this clear everyone, but the Core (1+year) Social Fun Organizers + Invited groups Organizers pays $5.
2. After 9PM you will have to pay another $10 as a cover charge for the Bar Entrance fee to get in so that $15 total. $10 to bar and $5 to cover the cost to rent the 2nd floor.
3. If you get in before 9PM you ONLY have to pay $5 to Biagio to cover the cost to rent. Hint Hint: Make sure you get there early!
4. It will be packed.
5. If you come after 7:30PM you might not even get in right away and will have to wait in line downstairs to go upstairs. So come at 7PM to get in.
6. They will not let you upstairs till 7PM so please wait downstairs till 7PM.
7. Tell Security you are with Social Fun to get in -Even if you are with a different group.

If you say ANY other group they will not let you in. I had a few issues with this last time and Security did not let some people in, because they could not remember to say they were with Social Fun.


With all that aside and if I have not scared you away then please join us for all this fun Friday starting at 7 till the cows come home.

The 6 Meetup Groups that are invited to come:


* Social Fun http://www.meetup.com.... (Confirmed by Biagio)
* The Boston Happy Hour http://nightlife.meet.... (Confirmed by Tonya)
* Beantown and Beyond 20-40 Singles http://singles.meetup.... (Confirmed by Catherine)
* The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group http://euro.meetup.co.... (Confirmed by Noelle)
* The Boston Night Life Meetup Group http://www.meetup.com.... (Confirmed by Rebecca)


Maybe RSVPs will be moved to NO RSVPs 1 week before the event with no exception. We try to target 250 YES RSVPs to hopefully get 160 members to actually show up!

We had over 175 members at last Mix and Mingle cross Meetup party .
It should be fun and I hope you can all join us for this blast of a party!
Ciao Biagio

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Mix and Mingle across Meetup party
